resources.string: I can learn anything if I give it time and effort.
I’m doing my best, and that is enough.
Each day I’m getting smarter, stronger, and more confident.
Mistakes help me grow and understand things better.
I’m proud of how far I’ve come on my learning journey.
I believe in my ability to solve problems and think creatively.
Every lecture and every project brings me closer to my goals.
I have the courage to ask questions and seek help when I need it.
I choose progress over perfection — one step at a time.
I deserve to rest and recharge — balance is part of success.
